string.name: app_name
string.context: Not translate

string.name: app_version
string.context: Not translate

string.name: sdk_version
string.context: Not translate

string.name: full_description_text
string.context: Full description text of the app in the Google Play page of the app

resources.string:
MEGA is a secure cloud storage service that gives you 50 GB free storage space. Unlike other cloud storage providers, your data is encrypted and decrypted by your client devices only and never by us.
Upload your files from your smartphone or tablet then search, store, download, stream, view, share, rename or delete your files any time, from any device, anywhere. Share folders with your contacts and see their updates in real time.
The encryption process means we cannot access or reset your password so you MUST remember it (unless you have your Master Key backed up) or you will lose access to your stored files.
Inside the app you can upgrade your storage space and bandwidth quota with a monthly or yearly subscription.
PRO LITE subscription: 4.99 € per month or 49.99 € per year gives you 200 GB of storage space and 1 TB of bandwidth per month.
PRO I subscription: 9.99 € per month or 99.99 € per year gives you 500 GB of storage space and 2 TB of bandwidth per month.
PRO II subscription: 19.99 € per month or 199.99 € per year gives you 2 TB of storage space and 4 TB of bandwidth per month.
PRO III subscription: 29.99 € per month or 299.99 € per year gives you 4 TB of storage space and 8 TB of bandwidth per month.
Subscriptions are renewed automatically for successive subscription periods of the same duration and at the same price as the initial period chosen. To manage your subscriptions, simply click on the Play Store icon on your handset, sign in with your Google ID (if you haven't already done so) and then click on the MEGA app. You'll be able to manage your subscription there.
For more info, please check our website: 
 https://mega.nz/mobile_terms.html 
 https://mega.nz/mobile_privacy.html 
New Terms of Service apply effective from 20 February 2016. See https://mega.nz/TermsOfService2016.pdf 
 Note: For desktop access to your files Mega needs to use HTML5 compatible browsers to handle our advanced features. We recommend Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome. However the mobile versions of browsers cannot access the Mega cloud storage system.

string.name: short_description_text
string.context: Short description text of the app in the Google Play page of the app

resources.string: MEGA is Cloud Storage with Powerful Always-On Privacy. 50GB for free

string.name: general_total_size
string.context: label for the total file size of multiple files and/or folders (no need to put the colon punctuation in the translation)

string.name: general_x_of_x
string.context: Showing progress of elements. Example: 2 of 10.

string.name: general_yes
string.context: Answer for confirmation dialog.

string.name: general_no
string.context: Answer for confirmation dialog.

string.name: general_cancel
string.context: Answer for confirmation dialog.

string.name: general_move_to
string.context: When moving a file to a location in MEGA. This is the text of the button after selection the destination

string.name: general_copy_to
string.context: When copying a file to a location in MEGA. This is the text of the button after selection the destination

string.name: general_import_to
string.context: When importing a file to a location in MEGA. This is the text of the button after selection the destination

string.name: general_select
string.context: Selecting a specific location in MEGA. This is the text of the button

string.name: general_select_to_upload
string.context: Selecting a specific location in MEGA. This is the text of the button

string.name: general_select_to_download
string.context: Selecting a specific location in MEGA. This is the text of the button

string.name: general_create
string.context: This is the final button when creating a folder in the dialog where the user inserts the folder name

string.name: general_upload
string.context: Button text when uploading a file to a previously selected location in MEGA

string.name: general_download
string.context: Item menu option upon right click on one or multiple files.

string.name: general_empty
string.context: Button to delete the contents of the trashbin. Can also be translated as "clear"

string.name: general_loading
string.context: state previous to import a file

string.name: general_importing
string.context: state while importing the file

string.name: general_import
string.context: Import button. When the user clicks this button the file will be imported to his account.

string.name: general_storage
string.context: Text listed before the amount of storage a user gets with a certain package. For example: "1TB Storage".

string.name: general_bandwidth
string.context: Text listed before the amount of bandwidth a user gets with a certain package. For example: "8TB Bandwidth". Can also be translated as data transfer.

string.name: general_subscribe
string.context: Text placed inside the button the user clicks when upgrading to PRO. Meaning: subscribe to this plan

string.name: general_continue
string.context: Text placed inside the button the user clicks when clicking into the FREE account. Meaning: Continue to the main screen

string.name: settings_secondary_upload_off

string.context: Title of the screen to backup the master key

string.name: backup_subtitle
string.context: Subtitle of the screen to backup the master key

resources.string: Your password unlocks your recovery key

string.name: backup_first_paragraph
string.context: First paragraph of the screen to backup the master key

resources.string: Your data is only readable through a chain of decryption operations that begins with your master encryption key, which we store encrypted with your password. This means that if you lose your password, your master key can no longer be decrypted, and you can no longer decrypt your data.

string.name: backup_second_paragraph
string.context: Second paragraph of the screen to backup the master key

resources.string: Exporting the master key and keeping it in a secure location enables you to set a new password without data loss.

string.name: backup_third_paragraph
string.context: Third paragraph of the screen to backup the master key

resources.string: An external attacker cannot gain access to your account with just your key. A password reset requires both the key and access to your e-mail.

string.name: backup_action
string.context: Sentence to inform the user the available actions in the screen to backup the master key

resources.string: Copy the recovery key to clipboard or save it as text file

string.name: save_action
string.context: Action of the button to save the master key as a text file

string.name: copy_MK_confirmation
string.context: Alert message when the master key has been successfully copied to the ClipBoard

resources.string: The recovery has been successfully copied

string.name: change_pass
string.context: Button to change the password

string.name: general_positive_button
string.context: Positive button to perform a general action

string.name: general_negative_button
string.context: Negative button to perform a general action

string.name: forgot_pass_menu
string.context: Option of the overflow menu to show the screen info to reset the password

string.name: forgot_pass
string.context: Button in the Login screen to reset the password

string.name: forgot_pass_first_paragraph
string.context: First paragraph of the screen when the password has been forgotten

resources.string: If you have a backup of your recovery crypto key, you can reset your password by selecting YES. No data will be lost.

string.name: forgot_pass_second_paragraph
string.context: Second paragraph of the screen when the password has been forgotten

resources.string: You can still export your recovery key now if you have an active MEGA session in any other browser on this or any other computer. If you don\'t, you can no longer decrypt your existing account, but you can start a new one under the same e-mail address by selecting NO.

string.name: forgot_pass_second_paragraph_logged_in
string.context: Second paragraph of the screen when the password has been forgotten and the user is still logged in

resources.string: If you don\'t, you can still export your recovery key now in this MEGA session. Please, go back and backup your recovery key.

string.name: forgot_pass_action
string.context: Sentence to ask to the user if he has the master key in the screen when the password has been forgotten

resources.string: Do you have a backup of your recovery key?

string.name: title_alert_reset_with_MK
string.context: Title of the alert message to ask for the link to reset the pass with the MK

string.name: edit_text_insert_mail
string.context: Hint of the text where the user can write his e-mail

string.name: text_alert_reset_with_MK
string.context: Text of the alert message to ask for the link to reset the pass with the MK

resources.string: Please enter you e-mail address below. You will receive a recovery link that will allow you to submit your recovery key and reset your password.

string.name: edit_text_insert_mk
string.context: Hint of the text when the user can write his master key

string.name: delete_account_text
string.context: Text shown in the alert dialog to confirm the cancellation of an account

resources.string: If you delete your account you will permanently lose all the data stored in the cloud. You will not be able to undo this action.

string.name: edit_text_insert_pass
string.context: Hint of the text where the user can write his password

string.name: delete_account_text_last_step
string.context: Text shown in the last alert dialog to confirm the cancellation of an account

resources.string: This is the last step to cancel your account. You will permanently lose all the data stored in the cloud. Please enter your password below.

string.name: email_verification_title
string.context: Title of the alert dialog to inform the user that have to check the email

string.name: email_verification_text
string.context: Text of the alert dialog to inform the user that have to check the email

resources.string: Please check your email to proceed.

string.name: email_verification_text_error
string.context: Text of the alert dialog to inform the user when an error occurs when cancelling the account

resources.string: An error occurred, please try again.

string.name: alert_not_logged_in
string.context: Alert to inform the user that have to be logged in to perform the action

resources.string: You must be logged in to perform this action.

string.name: invalid_string
string.context: Error when the user leaves empty the password field

string.name: invalid_email_title
string.context: Title of the alert dialog when the user tries to recover the pass of a non existing account

string.name: invalid_email_text
string.context: Title of the alert dialog when the user tries to recover the pass of a non existing account

resources.string: Please check the e-mail address and try again.

string.name: alert_not_logged_out
string.context: Alert to inform the user that have to be logged out to perform the action

resources.string: You must be logged out to perform this action.

string.name: title_dialog_insert_MK
string.context: Title of the dialog to write MK after opening the recovery link

string.name: text_dialog_insert_MK
string.context: Text of the dialog to write MK after opening the recovery link

resources.string: Please write below your recovery key.

string.name: pass_changed_alert
string.context: Text of the alert when the pass has been correctly changed

string.name: park_account_dialog_title
string.context: Title of the dialog to park an account

string.name: park_account_button
string.context: Button to park an account

string.name: park_account_title
string.context: Title of the screen to park an account

string.name: park_account_first_paragraph
string.context: First paragraph of the screen to park an account

resources.string: Due to our end-to-end encryption paradigm, you will not be able to access your data without either your password or a backup of your recovery key.

string.name: park_account_second_paragraph
string.context: Second paragraph of the screen to park an account

resources.string: You can park your existing account and start a fresh one under the same e-mail address. Your data will be retained for at least 60 days. In case that you recall your parked account\'s password, please contact support@mega.nz

string.name: dialog_park_account
string.context: Text of the dialog message to ask for the link to park the account

resources.string: Please enter you e-mail address below. You will receive a recovery link that will allow you to park your account.

string.name: park_account_text_last_step
string.context: Text shown in the last alert dialog to park an account

resources.string: This is the last step to park your account, please enter your new password. Your data will be retained for at least 60 days. In case that you recall your parked account\'s password, please contact support@mega.nz

string.name: title_enter_new_password
string.context: Title of the screen to write the new password after opening the recovery link

string.name: recovery_link_expired
string.context: Message when the user tries to open a recovery pass link and it has expired

resources.string: This recovery link has expired, please try again.

string.name: text_reset_pass_logged_in
string.context: Text of the alert after opening the recovery link to reset pass being logged.

resources.string: Your recovery key is going to be used to reset your password. Please, enter your new password.

string.name: email_verification_text_change_pass
string.context: Text of the alert dialog to inform the user that have to check the email after clicking the option forgot pass

resources.string: You will receive a recovery link that will allow you to reset your password.

string.name: my_account_upgrade_pro
string.context: Button to upgrade the account to PRO account in My Account Section

string.name: my_account_upgrade_pro_panel
string.context: Button to upgrade the account to PRO account in the panel that appears randomly

string.name: get_pro_account
string.context: Message to promote PRO accounts

resources.string: Improve your cloud capacity!\nGet more space & bandwidth with a Pro account!

string.name: toast_master_key
string.context: success message when the MasterKey file has been downloaded

resources.string: The recovery key has been backup into: %s.\nWhile the file remains in this path, you will find it at the Saved for Offline Section.\nNote: It will be deleted if you log out, please store it in a safe place.

string.name: next_ime_action
string.context: Action to pass focus to the next field in a form

string.name: error_changing_user_attributes
string.context: Message when an error ocurred when changing an user attribute

resources.string: Error when changing the account data.

string.name: success_changing_user_attributes
string.context: Message when an user attribute has been changed successfully

resources.string: Your account data has been correctly updated.

string.name: mail_already_used
string.context: Error shown when the user tries to change his mail to one that is already used

resources.string: Error. This email address is already in use.

string.name: change_mail_text_last_step
string.context: Text shown in the last alert dialog to change the email associated to an account

resources.string: This is the last step to change your email. Please enter your password below.

string.name: change_mail_title_last_step
string.context: Title of the alert dialog to change the email associated to an account

string.name: success_changing_user_mail
string.context: Message when the user email has been changed successfully

resources.string: Your email has been correctly updated.

string.name: title_new_warning_out_space
string.context: Iitle of the warning when the user is running out of space

string.name: new_warning_out_space
string.context: Text of the warning when the user is running out of space

resources.string: Take full advantage of your MEGA account by upgrading to PRO.

string.name: title_options_avatar_panel
string.context: Iitle of sliding panel to choose the option to edit the profile picture

string.name: take_photo_avatar_panel
string.context: Option of the sliding panel to change the avatar by taking a new picture

string.name: choose_photo_avatar_panel
string.context: Option of the sliding panel to change the avatar by choosing an existing picture

string.name: delete_avatar_panel
string.context: Option of the sliding panel to delete the existing avatar

string.name: incorrect_MK
string.context: Alert when the user introduces his MK to reset pass incorrectly

resources.string: The key you supplied does not match this account. Please make sure you use the correct recovery key and try again.

string.name: incorrect_MK_title
string.context: Title of the alert when the user introduces his MK to reset pass incorrectly

string.name: camera_uploads_empty
string.context: Text that indicates that no pictures have been uploaded to the Camera Uploads section

string.name: option_full_link
string.context: Alert Dialog to get link

string.name: recovering_info
string.context: Message shown meanwhile the app is waiting for a request

string.name: email_verification_text_change_mail
string.context: Text of the alert dialog to inform the user that have to check the email to validate his new email

resources.string: Your new email address needs to be validated. Please check your email to proceed.

string.name: confirmation_delete_avatar
string.context: Confirmation before deleting the avatar of the user's profile

resources.string: Your picture profile will be deleted. Do you want to proceed?

string.name: title_edit_profile_info
string.context: Title of the Dialog to edit the profile attributes of the user's account

string.name: title_set_expiry_date
string.context: Alert Dialog to get link

string.name: subtitle_set_expiry_date
string.context: Alert Dialog to get link

string.name: edit_link_option
string.context: Option of the sliding panel to edit the link of a node

string.name: old_password_provided_incorrect
string.context: Error alert dialog shown when changing the password the user provides an incorrect password

resources.string: The current password you have provided is incorrect.

string.name: number_correctly_reinvite_contact_request
string.context: success message when reinviting multiple contacts

string.name: number_correctly_delete_contact_request
string.context: success message when reinviting multiple contacts

string.name: number_no_delete_contact_request
string.context: error message when reinviting multiple contacts

resources.string: %1$d requests successfully deleted but %2$d requests were not deleted.

string.name: confirmation_delete_contact_request
string.context: confirmation message before removing a contact request.

resources.string: Do you want to remove the invitation request to %s?

string.name: confirmation_remove_multiple_contact_request
string.context: confirmation message before removing mutiple contact request

resources.string: Do you want to remove these %d invitation requests?

string.name: number_correctly_invitation_reply_sent
string.context: success message when replying to multiple received request

string.name: number_incorrectly_invitation_reply_sent
string.context: error message when replying to multiple received request

resources.string: %1$d request replies successfully sent but %2$d were not sent.

item.context: referring to a invitation request in the Contacts section
referring to a invitation request in the Contacts section

string.name: confirmation_remove_outgoing_shares
string.context: Confirmation before removing the outgoing shares of a folder

string.name: error_incorrect_email_or_password
string.context: Error message when the credentials to login are incorrect.

resources.string: Invalid e-mail and/or password. Please try again.

string.name: error_account_suspended
string.context: Error message when trying to login and the account is suspended.

resources.string: Your account have been suspended due to Terms of Service violations. Please contact to support@mega.co.nz

string.name: too_many_attempts_login
string.context: Error message when to many attempts to login.

resources.string: Too many attempts to login, please wait for an hour.

string.name: account_not_validated_login
string.context: Error message when trying to login to an account not validated.

resources.string: This account has not been validated yet. Please, check your e-mail.

string.name: general_error_folder_not_found
string.context: Error message shown when opening a folder link which doesn't exist

string.name: folder_link_unavaible_ToS_violation
string.context: Error message shown when opening a folder link which has been removed due to ToS/AUP violation

resources.string: The folder link has been removed because of a ToS/AUP violation.

string.name: general_error_file_not_found
string.context: Error message shown when opening a file link which doesn't exist

string.name: file_link_unavaible_ToS_violation
string.context: Error message shown when opening a file link which has been removed due to ToS/AUP violation

resources.string: The file link has been removed because of a ToS/AUP violation.

string.name: action_unselect_one
string.context: Menu item to unselect all the elements of a list

string.name: confirm_email_text
string.context: Title of the screen after creating the account. That screen asks the user to confirm the account by checking the email

string.name: confirm_email_explanation
string.context: Text below the title that explains the user should check the email and click the link to confirm the account

resources.string: Please check your email and click the link to confirm your account.

item.context: Singular of items which contains a folder. 1 item
Plural of items which contains a folder. 2 items

string.name: file_link_unavaible_delete_account
string.context: Error message shown when opening a file or folder link which account has been removed due to ToS/AUP violation

resources.string: The associated user account has been terminated due to multiple violations of our Terms of Service.

string.name: general_error_invalid_decryption_key
string.context: Error message shown after login into a folder link with an invalid decryption key

resources.string: The provided decryption key for the folder link is invalid.

string.name: my_account_my_credentials
string.context: Title of the label in the my account section. It shows the credentials of the current user so it can be used to be verified by other contacts

string.name: limited_bandwith
string.context: Word to indicate the limited bandwidth of the free accounts

string.name: remove_contact_shared_folder
string.context: Message to confirm if the user wants to delete a contact from a shared folder

resources.string: The contact %s will be removed from the shared folder.

string.name: remove_multiple_contacts_shared_folder
string.context: Message to confirm if the user wants to delete a multiple contacts from a shared folder

resources.string: %d contacts will be removed from the shared folder.

string.name: number_correctly_removed_from_shared
string.context: success message when removing a contact from a shared folder

resources.string: %d contacts removed correctly from the shared folder

string.name: number_incorrectly_removed_from_shared
string.context: success message when removing a contact from a shared folder

resources.string: and %d contacts were not successfully removed

string.name: error_not_logged_with_correct_account
string.context: Error message shown when opening a cancel link with an account that not corresponds to the link

resources.string: This link is not related to this account. Please, log in with the correct account.

string.name: cancel_link_expired
string.context: Message when the user tries to open a cancel link and it has expired

resources.string: This cancel link has expired, please try again.

string.name: no_results_found
string.context: Text shown after searching and no results found

string.name: error_sharing_folder
string.context: Message shown when the folder sharing process fails

resources.string: Error sharing the folder. Please, try again.

string.name: incoming_shares_label
string.context: title of the section that shows all the incoming shared items

plurals.name: confirmation_remove_contact
plurals.context: confirmation message before removing a contact
plurals.item: All data associated with the selected contact will be permanently lost.
All data associated with the selected contacts will be permanently lost.

plurals.name: title_confirmation_remove_contact
plurals.context: title of confirmation alert before removing a contact
